website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty steel fire ring gives you the option of cooking more than just hot dogs.
pros: Similar to the ones used by the U.S. Forest Service
Drain holes prevent rust and ventilate fire
Sturdy and durable, but not too heavy to move if necessary
cons: The grate is removable, but the bracket that holds it is not

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I bought the stone from lowes without their ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I bought the stone from lowes without their fire ring so I could have the grill part. This fit just right. The Rock was 80 bucks or so. Chopped off he little steel tabs and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: GBusti

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit ring!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fire pit ring. It came quickly. It required minor assembling and it didn’t contain any instructions but I managed to assemble it quickly (5 min work) just using my intuition. The packaging was not great. The box was broken in multiple parts and the ring had some minor scratches but I didn’t care since it’s going to get scratched anyway. I put it inside my paver-made fire pit to protect the pavers and it looks great. In order to fit it into the paved fire pit I had to hammer down two hooks (which you would use if you want to anchor it to the ground).
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic value! It looks sharp and will definitely hold up for many many years to come. I buried it down a bit, packed sand around the outer perimeter to allow for drainage, and put sand and firebrick under it as well. The only thing I wish was different was that the grill could be raised and lowered. When I have logs in it it is very hard to try to cook anything as the logs sit high enough I usually have to swivel the grill out from the pit.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, but don't plan on any help putting it together.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy steal fire pit with an excellent swinging grill that holds up some serious weight. We've loved it from the second we put it in place. However, the instructions/manual which is only found online is seriously laughable. No help whatsoever. It isn't bad to figure out, just letting you know you're on your own on this part of the process.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Hansen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: We built this into our backyard remodel instead of buying one of the low quality versions from the big hardware stores. This thing is built like a tank. I left the grill grate bolt off of the assembly so that I can lift and remove it when desired if I'm not cooking on it. The grill surface is heavy solid steel, it will never wear out. When I burn oak, cooking bbq chicken on it is a treat greater than any restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Deans

customer_reviews.title: Thick gauge steel and looks like it will last longer than your usual portable fire pits.
customer_reviews.text: I paired it with paving stones from HD, and it turned out to be a great simple project. The ring is made of thick gauge steel and looks like it will last longer than your usual portable fire pits. It will likely get rusty at some point but I expect that from any similar material, and you can just scrub it off and touch it up with flame retardant paint. The cooking grate requires some seasoning prior to use, washing it with soap and water, then brush on some cooking oil. I cover up the pit with a tarp to help prevent moisture from getting in. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: V. David

customer_reviews.title: Love it! (32")
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, grate is sturdy (even when it faces out), Had to hammer the pin holders in so it will fit in the wall, but it was not difficult. Rumblestone brick and pavers from Home Depot dug in an inch below the surface, all purpose gravel three inches deep in the interior (5"x10" drainage hole in the middle), more peagravel planned for the outside perimeter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: While there were no instructions a quick examination of the parts made assembly quick and easy. All in all I recommend this prod
customer_reviews.text: While I have yet to use it for its designed purpose I found the Steel Fire Ring (32") extremely well made. While there were no instructions a quick examination of the parts made assembly quick and easy. All in all I recommend this product. While it isn't the prettiest bell at the ball it certainly is one of the best "dancers". Great value for the money. I expect this purchase to last out my lifetime with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Collier

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty and well designed
customer_reviews.text: The simple corrugated medium shipping box was undersigned and falling apart when received, but the sturdy fire ring and grill survived unscathed. The fire ring is one piece and solid. the grill swings away from the fire nicely when adding wood. This fire ring plus grill will last me the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: WoodworkerBED

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is Inadequate
customer_reviews.text: The grill itself is very good. Very sturdy construction. However, I have purchased two of them , (on separate occasions), and on both occasions the shipping packaging arrived in tatters. On the first occasion the grill suffered some minor damage from this poor packaging. On the second occasion the grill arrived undamaged. I would have given a five star rating except for the packaging issue.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Peckham

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded our expectations! Very sturdy materials used. Also having the swivel grill top was a plus as well. Can’t go wrong with this fire pit ring. Shipping was super fast as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob R

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quick shipment allowed me to build my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quick shipment allowed me to build my fire pit in no time. Very good quality and should last many years of regular use. I would definitely recommend to my friends looking to build their own fire pit. Just like camping but at home in the back yard!
customer_reviews.author: Seaweed

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy steel gauge
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy steel gauge, great quality just like the nice ones in the National Parks. It was easy to install and directions weren't needed. No directions were in the box, but it's a no-brainer. GREAT product that I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Vance

customer_reviews.title: Melted by fire
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift a couple of years ago. It looks great and seems like a fun thing, but after a while the fire pit melted. Melted? One would think that a fire pit would be made to withstand, um, fire. The kind of fire that gets hot. Sadly, this one is apparently not ready for fire.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good campfire ring
customer_reviews.text: Had our first fire last night, works perfectly. Needed a bit of help with instructions; remove nut and bolt from grate and discard. Place grate on top, insert cylinder through and attach with new nut from cylinder. Also, hold downs were not clear; two lugs on side of fire ring but could not attach with those so we put the hold downs over the rim and there was enough length to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ed P

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal On Quality Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The fire ring and cooking grate I received are exactly as advertised - very heavy duty construction. I am really pleased to get such a quality product at the price I paid and with free shipping - unbelievable deal. The only negative I found was in the packaging. Some of the pieces had become loose during shipping and chipped off some of the heat resistant paint - simple fix.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: Pit wasn’t perfectly round. Decent build. Swing away grill is awesome. Decent
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, not flaking, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Exact dimensions, NOT flaking like other campfire rings. It beat up the box it came in, held up fine. Currently being used as a firepit core, with rocks stacked around it as design. Didn't bother putting down the security rods as this is on hard to access private property so no fear of it being stolen (too heavy anyways :) ).
customer_reviews.author: TastyWhale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: We have a cabin in the woods. I ordered the 32 inch steel fire ring with cooking grate. We used it this weekend, worked great. I ordered a second one for the back of the cabin. The Grandchildren like to have a fire in front of the cabin and i like to relax in back. Its a lot more heavy duty than i expected. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Kohtz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been able to try it yet, but put it together. Looks like it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Dye

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after less than one year, but would still buy again...
customer_reviews.text: It is rusting pretty badly after less than one year, but it is very heavy duty and think it will hold up for many more years. At the reasonable price paid, would still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sola Scriptura

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our backyard. Kids love a campfire when camping and this allows us to have a campfire at home. This is very much like what you would see in a state campground. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, great fire ring.
customer_reviews.text: A+ heavy duty steel ,all welded construction, good packing, worth the money, the grill is removable if you don't install bottom bolt. Picture in the review is of my project that's 75% done.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight steel and very nicely made. We had a problem with a bolt ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight steel and very nicely made. We had a problem with a bolt being torqued too tight on the tube assembly that holds the grill in place. Great customer service! They are sending me a new part no problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sieve

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Ring
customer_reviews.text: Great service. Received the fire ring early. Love the product, it looks and works great. And their customer service was fantastic with follow up making sure that the product met our expectations and it certainly does. Highly recommend the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Brown

customer_reviews.title: easy essembly, haven’t used it yet though
customer_reviews.text: Solid structure , easy essembly, haven’t used it yet though. Wonder if the handle gets too hot
customer_reviews.author: Astrid Hall

customer_reviews.title: Thick and heavy construction
customer_reviews.text: Thick, heavy steel construction. This pit blows away all the skimpy firepits you can buy at the box stores that rust through in one season. This firepit will likely be around longer than I am which is exactly what I wanted. And it's just a little bit more than the cheap-o made in china China ones
customer_reviews.author: Joke-r

customer_reviews.title: Very well built!
customer_reviews.text: This was used for a fire pit I built in my backyard. It is very sturdy and it fit right in. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Alain alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Product was excellent. We love it
customer_reviews.text: Product was excellent. We love it. It is only missing one star because it came with absolutely no instructions. I called the 800 number on the box and the gentleman immediately emailed me a parts diagram, which helped a lot but did not explain some things we still had questions about. But we managed to get it set up and we enjoy an awesome fire just like at the campgrounds.
customer_reviews.author: Mia M.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a fire pit, you need one of these
customer_reviews.text: High quality piece. Grill swings out nicely. Much better than flop over style.
customer_reviews.author: VW and Drag Nut

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My 32 inch fire ring arrived and was easy to assemble. It is constructed well and looks durable as other reviewers have mentioned. The only improvement could be on the packaging for shipping. Mine arrived loose in a damaged card board box a week after my order as promised. It startled me when I saw the box but thankfully nothing was damaged inside. The product itself is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Nader

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Well manufactured. Packaging could be improved as box in really bad shape on delivery with heavy metal steel parts protruding from box resulting in some scratches during shipping. Overall though very solid and happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As epected
customer_reviews.text: As expected. However there were no assembly instructions included so I had to kind of figure it out. Instructions would allow for quicker assembly.
customer_reviews.author: purple

customer_reviews.title: Buy this fire ring.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good fire ring with a good turning grill. The thickness of the metal is very good. Looks like it will be a very easy installation. The product and seller get five stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Big J.

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love it!! I raised it up off the ground with bricks and then piled rocks around it from a near by canyon. Havent cooked on it yet. definitely would recommend this and have. easy to put together, just need an adjustable wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S. DellaCroce

customer_reviews.title: Love this Firepit/grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent choice for an outdoor grill. We just love it! We had a question to the seller and it was answered quickly. There really isn't much to put together and we had a cookout that evening after receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of camping and when my husband mentioned how nice it would be to have one of the fire rings in our backyard like we see at some of the campgrounds we visit I thought it was a great birthday gift for him. I did a Web search, compared several, and chose this one from Titan. We are not disappointed with the choice! Very sturdy, the grate has plenty of clearance when swivled, and the quality is such that I suspect it will last forever! Thanks, Titan, for helping me surprise my hubby with a great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Leila Maier

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: But this fire ring grill for my son as part of an outdoor inground fire pit. Love it !! very heavy duty. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: JenS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Just like the fire rings at the state ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Just like the fire rings at the state park campgrounds! We are enjoying our backyard campfire as I write this.
customer_reviews.author: nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We placed an order the Sunday before Memorial Day, hoping to receive it before the holiday weekend so we could set up in the yard. Sure enough, five days later on Friday afternoon the fire pit was delivered. This was so easy to set up, and is the perfect size for our backyard. We used a bed of sand inside the pit and pea gravel and granite rocks on the outside. We love that the cooking grate swivels over the pit instead of folding over.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fire ring review.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Well constructed. It is exactly what I expected from the product description that was given.
customer_reviews.author: DAG

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. Bought it for a friend and had the hole dug and bricks set in an hour. Enjoyed a fire shortly after. This is a campground quality fire ring with thick walls. One solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Durable construction fire ring for DIY Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: This fire ring is very well made, nice with thick steel, durable construction. I build my fire pit with pavers around it and like it a lot, can't wait to use it when weather is permit. I received it just on time when doing the patio works.
customer_reviews.author: WH.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for my fire pit I built from retaining wall bricks. I just needed to grind off the tabs at the base to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fire ring! Heavy and well built and I think it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our new fire pit that we put in, had the concrete poured around this ring! We love it and we use it as much as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Milka_0517

customer_reviews.title: US Forest Service type of fire ring
customer_reviews.text: As described, this is the US Forest Service type of fire ring. The ring is one piece, really solid. The grill and pivot are also clearly built to last.
customer_reviews.author: David Phillips

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it was all 1 piece and made from real steel no crappy stuff. Thought the instructions could have been a little more clear. A+
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fire ring and grill!!
customer_reviews.text: I can tell we will get many hours and many years of enjoyment out of this. The 32" is perfect for a decent size fire, and the grill swings perfectly over the fire for cooking, then out of the way when you are done with it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cary

customer_reviews.title: Missing Tube Assembly
customer_reviews.text: We received the Titan FireRing32. Not able to assemble bc it is missing Tube Assembly #P 899912-4, contacting Titan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a fire pit
customer_reviews.text: It works, but you get what you pay for. The only reason I still have it is because Titan forced me to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: mike leveck

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I am putting it in the back yard ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am putting it in the back yard now. I cut off the flanges for the anchors. Shot it with some extra burly heat res paint and we will see tonight! Thing is built tough and a bargain for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Moody

customer_reviews.title: Well built product! Very heavy construction-will outlast many of ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built product!Very heavy construction-will outlast many of the thin metal types from Lowes,etc.Very fast delivery! I surrounded mine with 3 courses of retaining wall blocks and installed on 4 24"x24" cement slabs over 6" of crushed stone and sand for stability.A big hit on Memorial Day with my 2 grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. This is actually the second one that I've bought; I bought the first one over three years ago. I bought this one as a house-warming gift (no pun intended) for my daughter and son-in-law who wanted one for their new home.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Humpert

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty fire ring. Excellent customer service. My first grill grate was slightly bent I contacted customer service & they mailed me a new grill immediately
customer_reviews.author: gabulldog

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, easy to put together, very sturdy. This fire ring is self explanatory, just drop it where you want it and you are ready to go. Dropped it in our backyard, looking forward to many a camp fires in our own backyard! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Em

customer_reviews.title: So fun for the back yard
customer_reviews.text: So fun for the back yard. We throw all our paper in here from the week and then roast apples and dried fruit in a non-stick frying pan .... We love it!
customer_reviews.author: ElenaMAT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Easy to modify. Is exactly as the description states.
customer_reviews.text: This insert worked just fine and the size is exactly as stated. I first stacked my bricks and glued them and didn't decide til later to get a insert with a grate. The reason I'm saying this is because this insert has two prongs that stick out in case you want to use it as a standalone pit and would be difficult to insert into already stacked bricks.To keep from breaking the bricks apart to get the inert in, I just hammered the prongs flat. If you don't have something to cut it with, a hammer will work just fine. The grate is easy to install and youcan also set it up to be removable when need be.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Great fire circle, but how do these anchors work?
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Great looking. No real instructions or suggestions as to installation. The anchors, in particular, are not obvious. But the grill and circle are hell-for-stout, which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly wowed at first sight.
customer_reviews.text: Opened up box to find a pretty poor looking product. Coating peeling off all over the place.. Not sure if it was a return item or what but kind of expected it to look new.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy fire ring for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy fire ring for the money. Shipping was super fast, had it in a day! It was just what I was looking for, at over 3 times less the cost anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and well packaged. Setup took about 1 minute in the dark. Seems sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Buying through amazon saves a lot of money on shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Back yard fire pit. Titan usually makes good products. This is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the 32 inch fire ring.
customer_reviews.text: This fire ring is heavy duty and well made. Delivery was amazingly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Judy from Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction--heavy duty--easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty construction, packaged well, excellent grill design. We're making excellent memories and couldn't be more pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan A

customer_reviews.title: Will last
customer_reviews.text: Great heavyweight construction. Fast shipping Cons The weld was to large to fit through the hole so had to be ground down for the grate to be attached. Cost me 20 to have done. Works great now
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite sellers on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite sellers on Amazon, great products at a great value. This fire ring is a nice addition to our backyard campground.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice ring to it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. The ring is a single piece of heavy steel. Looks like it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really solid construction. I'll have to update it, if it cannot last through the elements and fires.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: nicely made but wouldn't work for me as i have ...
customer_reviews.text: well worth the money. nicely made but wouldn't work for me as i have a fire pit, i thought that i would be able to use it there. it can't be used in one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product great price heavy fire ring should last several ...
customer_reviews.text: great product great price heavy fire ring should last several years swing out grill well made great purchase
customer_reviews.author: donald t

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a good fire ring!
customer_reviews.text: Good thick steel - like at public campgrounds. Nice grill that can be detached. So far -very satisfied...time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. So easy to cook on. It is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is of solid construction, but the grille started to rust in spots after the 1st rain.
customer_reviews.author: BSchauerte

customer_reviews.title: Started to rust pretty quickly, like with in a few months
customer_reviews.text: Started to rust pretty quickly, like with in a few months. I expected something a little longer lasting than half a grilling season.
customer_reviews.author: wesleyjack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it but it was exactly what we wear looking for very heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: GREENE74

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy Fire Ring
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy Fire Ring. Using it for camping and at the house for parties. Fast shipping and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rieger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great very sturdy campfire ring, just like the ones we admired at parks.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Janecka

customer_reviews.title: This is just like the grills in the camp grounds
customer_reviews.text: The fire ring and grate are made of thick metal. This is just like the grills in the camp grounds. The handle screws into the grate, which could be welded but kept it cool to move around. I used the ring day and night for four days and the paint seemed to hold up well. This should provide may years of enjoyment. Very happy....
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for, the only complaint ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, the only complaint is it took me a few minutes to figure out how to put the thing together. I look forward to using it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This is very good quality and the price is great
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality and the price is great, very heavy duty (much better than I expected). Weighs 57 lbs,
customer_reviews.author: Helen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: High quality and durable fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and craftsmanship. This firepit will last forever. Arrived quickly and was relatively simple to put in together. We're very excited to build our first campfire of the season.
customer_reviews.author: Bonniejean

customer_reviews.title: They look easy to repair once my dirt work is done
customer_reviews.text: The tie down brackets on the side were bent during shipping. They look easy to repair once my dirt work is done,and I install the fire ring "
customer_reviews.author: From Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Solid, looks like our backyard is a campground, and really helps keep a fire burning hot
customer_reviews.author: jpq517

customer_reviews.title: Perfect useful and great design
customer_reviews.text: We have cooked many steak dinners on the grill over a wood fire. Perfect useful and great design. Very sturdy!!! After a rain, a little WD40 helps.
customer_reviews.author: Pxbydeb

customer_reviews.title: For the money, it's a great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I had the fire ring together in 5 minutes, roasting dogs in an hour [gotta get the right bed of coals!!]. No instructions included, but none needed. Very thick gauge steel on all parts.
customer_reviews.author: buynbryn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean-up leftover ash and debris
customer_reviews.text: Substantial fire ring. Easy to clean-up leftover ash and debris. Very pretty with landscaping bricks surrounding ring. Heavy --- have a friend handy when ready to move and install in desired location.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. The fire ring is built extremely well with heavy duty materials. It should last for years. Also pleased with the quick shipment. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Robidoux

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to install and use. Put it together with two rows of fire pit bricks in about two hours, Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks like I am going to get a lot of use ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, looks like I am going to get a lot of use out of this motha.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected-love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected-love this!! I wish all sites I ordered from was as quick and as thorough as amazon-never been disappointed-thanks
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: After camping with my wife and 3 kids I decided to build a fire pit at home. This fire ring was perfect. It's well made and the removable grill is great for backyard cookouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done, fair value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice value and easy to build. Have it at the cabin and looking forward to some cookouts.
customer_reviews.author: Perturbo Ventus

customer_reviews.title: We love our fire ring
customer_reviews.text: We love our fire ring. We do lots of at home open fire cooking, and the design is simple and sturdy. The best. We feel like we are a national forest campground, which makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Claire E Sandford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. this is the second one I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fisher

customer_reviews.title: terrific value
customer_reviews.text: Nice fire pit grill, compares to others costing much more. Great value, great service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: this is what I have used at State parks and love.Had to have my own for the Cabin. Will definitely get another one.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: I like the versatility of acting as a ring grill for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of acting as a ring grill for my stone fire- pit and also will serve me well as a portable fire-pit on those trips to the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, heavy duty, seems like it will last a long time. We used it the first night we got it by cooking burgers on an open fire in the backyard with our grand kids. It was great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Payne

customer_reviews.title: We love it, best steak ever
customer_reviews.text: We love it, best steak ever. You can set pots of food on it , very sturdy. It is steel so it will rust, just sayin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Titan Outdoors 32" Steel Fire Ring with Cooking Grate Campfire Pit Park Grill BBQ Camping Trail
feature_bullets: Heavy duty 10ga thick rolled steel - Grill swivels 180 degrees
Two 1/2" thick anchor pins allow the Fire Ring to tip back for easy cleaning and to prevent theft - 5 Lower Drain Holes to prevent rust and ventilate fire
Upper draft holes provided ventilation for the fire - High Temp Paint will prevent rust for years
Cooking grate: 15.5" x 19.5" (300 Sq. in.) - Height: 7 3/4"
